server_configuration.name: QDRANT_URL
server_configuration.description: URL of the Qdrant server, e.g. http://localhost:6333

server_configuration.name: QDRANT_API_KEY
server_configuration.description: API key for the Qdrant server

server_configuration.name: COLLECTION_NAME
server_configuration.description: Name of the collection to use

server_configuration.name: QDRANT_LOCAL_PATH
server_configuration.description: Path to the local Qdrant database

server_configuration.name: FASTEMBED_MODEL_NAME
server_configuration.description: Name of the FastEmbed model to use
